title: Crashing in ranked patch 7.10
body: So all though this isn't happening to me personally, my friends are having trouble with connecting to ranked games. They have expressed there frustrations and concerns with this as they don't particularly enjoy losing LP for connection issues and as such. What I'm curious about is whether there is a bug still within the client that made it through the testing or something is going wrong in terms of their connections @Agent Mindstar might be able to help with this. They say their connections are stable and there isn't anything wrong hardware wise either so yeah.
